articles.description: The 2025 West Point graduation speech comes at a pivotal time for Trump, who is installing his populist-fueled agenda in the U.S. armed forces
articles.content: Sporting a "Make America Great Again" hat, President Donald Trump emphasized the need for the country to put its priorities above all else during his commencement addresses at West Point on Saturday.… [+7276 chars]
